name: NeoTrap
description:
NeoTrap - A music based fast-paced action game

Get your headphones, increase the volume, make it full-screen and play NeoTrap! Watch how NeoTrap is adjusting itself to the music in real-time!

NeoTrap's source code is available here: https://github.com/omarhuseynov011/NeoTrap

You can choose whichever music you like from the menu

Have fun! :)
